General.Name: Yoshiharu Global Co.
General.Description: Yoshiharu Global Co., together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates Japanese restaurants in California. It offers bone broth, ramen, rice bowls, appetizers, sushi rolls, bento boxes, and other Japanese cuisines. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Brea, California.
General.Address: 596 Apollo St., Brea, CA, United States, 92821
